about_the_game:
Highschool53 takes you on a mysterious and terrifying journey into a deserted and mysterious world. In this game, you will enter a world full of secrets, monsters, and conspiracies that will uncover a mysterious organization known as "Gino Zoll". The hero of the story, Ahmed, is a young man facing financial challenges that threaten his future and life, forcing him to accept an offer he cannot refuse from this organization.

Story:

After Ahmed receives an unexpected offer from the "Gino Zoll" organization, he finds himself forced to accept a dangerous mission to collect a group of hidden items in an abandoned high school in Al-Shorouk Governorate, a remote area filled with mystery in the Saudi desert. This school was the center of a group of secret genetic experiments, and the mysterious past left its traces on the place, creating a terrifying atmosphere that is merciless to anyone who tries to approach.

The game begins when Ahmed signs a secret contract, dictating that he must accept the dangerous consequences of this mission. The player embarks on a dangerous adventure, where he must navigate the dark and scary corridors of the school, while being ambushed by terrifying monsters that inhabit this place. Each step represents a new challenge, and with each progress, Ahmed uncovers mysterious secrets that link genetic experiments conducted in the past to threats that threaten the present and future.

Gameplay:

Highschool53 combines tactical horror and puzzle-solving, where players must think smart and make quick decisions to survive. You will need to explore the abandoned school, collect evidence, and use your wits to overcome the obstacles you will face. The camera mounted on Ahmed's body, which he receives from "Gino Zoll", allows the organization to monitor his every move, adding an extra layer of dread and tension.

Key Game Features:

A detailed and immersive world: Explore a school environment full of horror and secrets. The game is designed to reflect the local Saudi character and provide an unconventional experience in the world of horror games.

Diverse and intelligent enemies: You will encounter monsters and creatures that haunt you everywhere, each with different abilities and behaviors, which increases the challenge and enhances the atmosphere of constant fear.

Complex and interconnected puzzles: Solving puzzles requires using the clues you collect during your exploration. Each puzzle reveals new details about the mysterious past of the school and the experiments of "Gino Zoll".

An exciting and multi-dimensional story: Uncover the conspiracies that link genetic experiments to the village of Sunrise, and delve into the hidden motives of the "Gino Zoll" organization and what they are trying to achieve.

Choices that determine fate: Your decisions in the game have a major impact on the development of the story and how you uncover the secrets. Each decision can bring you closer or further from the final truth.

An immersive cinematic experience: The game is designed with high cinematic quality, with cinematic scenes that build tension and put you directly in the heart of the event.

The biggest mystery:

The "Gino Zoll" organization is not what it seems. Your main mission may be just a small part of a larger scheme that includes dangerous scientific experiments related to genetic modification. Every step you take brings you closer to uncovering the truth, but are you prepared for what you will find?

Will you be able to survive?

As you approach the end, you will realize that survival is not the only goal. You will face physical and psychological challenges that force you to make difficult decisions. As the tension mounts, it will become difficult to distinguish friend from foe, reality from the nightmares you see.

Highschool53 is not just a traditional horror game, it is an adventure that puts you face to face with your inner fears and mental challenges. Get ready to explore this dark world and uncover its terrifying secrets!

name: Highschool53

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this game, you will enter a world full of secrets, monsters, and you will uncover a mysterious organization known as "Gino Zol". The hero of the story, Ahmed, is a young man facing financial challenges that threaten his future and his life, which forces him to accept an offer he cannot refuse.
